subject: Re: OT: The goals of CMM (Re: [junit] wanted Junit professionals urgently)
msgSnippet: ... I stand corrected. http://www.newtechusa.com/PPI/pressroom.asp#higher -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1
messageBody:
J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

> Michael Holly wrote:
>
> > The point I'm making is that if you do not have goals then you won't
> get the
> > benefits of reaching
> > even part of your goal.
>
> From what I understand the goal of CMM is to define a process that even
> a monkey could follow. Monkeys do not write software; people do.

I stand corrected. http://www.newtechusa.com/PPI/pressroom.asp#higher
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
